original_text: Hathach was one of the king's eunuchs who served Esther. Esther asked him to discover what was the matter with Mordecai.
korean_text: 에스더가 왕의 어명으로 자기에게 가까이 있는 내시 하닥을 불러 명령하여 모르드개에게 가서 이것이 무슨 일이며 무엇 때문인가 알아보라 하매

sentences.original_text: Hathach was one of the king's eunuchs
sentences.korean_translation: 하닥은 왕의 내시 중 한 사람이었다

sentences.original_text: to discover what was the matter
